medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began with a new onset and progressed over the next six to eight hours, leading to tachycardia and requiring intubation.

Grave's disease - treated with iodine ablation in ___. 5. Depression/Anxiety. 6. Possible complex partial seizures in ___ - normal work-up including MRI and EEG. 7.
